attributes.title: Worst App
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to give me reasons why I should vote for Trump. After downloading the app, I still won’t vote for Trump. There are no good reasons to vote for him.

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: when i went to download this it took forever to download and then when i went to finally open the app, it immediately kicked me off again. this app needs some serious changes made

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app is so trash, it didn’t give me any good reasons to vote for a man with a bad spray tan. He claims that he going to “make America great again” but in reality, he’s tearing it apart.

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and was horrible quality.

attributes.title: we will win
attributes.review: this is possibly THE WORST app that i have ever downloaded! it is filled with useless stupid information that only uneducated idiots use and look at. GEN Z WILL RISE AND WE ARE NOT GOING DOWN WITH OUT A FIGHT.
